articles.description: Judges and viewers were amazed as the star disguised as a root vegetable was revealed
articles.content:
Fans of The Masked Dancer were gobsmacked as the latest star was unmasked.
It was the turn of the character Beetroot to be voted off the ITV guessing game during the third night and jaws dropped as … [+2423 chars]

articles.title: Biden issues proclamation on Tulsa race massacre - POLITICO

articles.title: US tyre maker Goodyear faces allegations of labour abuse in Malaysia, documents show - CNA
